revised_title: Medical and Chemical Analysis of Antimony Preparations
tldr: The author, John Huxham, discusses the various preparations and effects of antimony in medicine. He explains the importance of understanding the chemical composition of antimony and its components to safely and effectively use it as a remedy. Huxham also explores the differences in reactions and properties of antimony preparations based on their combinations and doses, and how these factors can determine whether antimony is a poison or a remedy.
